titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 71) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2000, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-396, by Mr. Dreier.

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 71 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 133.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 334.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/18/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.J. Res. 71 (continuing appropriations).
